name: Sans Simulator (GAME BROTHERS STUDIOS)
description:
!!This is Finished Because my engine crashed while in progress and I did not save!!

CONTROLS

M:  change sans expression

L:  Make Soul Blue

WASD:  Soul Controls

Arrow Keys:  Sans Soul Slam

1:  Kill Sans

Space:  Sans Dodge

Select the attacks

and click on screen
